name: Shot-Beater
description:
THE GAME

A small Shoot'em-up game. With great beats! 8 individual designed Levels with different challenges. Challange yourself to get the best highscore in best time.

Be Master of shooting and time-manipulation. Drop the the beat in Slow-mo and play the peak faster than it is.

CONTROL - Keyboard

W,A,S,D - Movement

Q - Slow-Mo

E - Rush

ESC - Memu

Mouse - Aiming

Mouse L - Shoot

CONTROL - Gamepad

RT - Shoot

RB - Rush

LB - Slow-mo

L-Stick - Movement

R-Stick - Aiming

NOTES:

If you have that feeling your control is broken, be aware to check out the right option.
Especially "keyboard" or "gamepad" play mode.
